name: Santa's workshop puzzle escape
description:
Designed and created for the inaugural Yogscast JingleJam Game Jam.

Designed for two players. You and a buddy must work together to escape Santa's Workshop (Stoke-on-Trent branch).

Controls

Requires Mouse or Trackpad for Menu's

Requires 2 XBOX Controllers to play the Levels in Multiplayer. (Works with keyboard for Player 1 Only)

Move Left and Right

A / Left Arrow Key

How to Play

The objective is to reach the end of the level by completing puzzles. Help by giving eachother gifts to place on the pedestals. Make sure you place the correct gifts on them to avoid a nasty surprise.

Modifiers used:

- High Rollers
- Brunch Club
- Vidiots
